biotools.summary: MolPredictX is a web tool that allows the scientific community to obtain biological activities predictions of molecules. MolPredictX manages predictive models already published in indexed scientific articles and makes predictions of molecules the researcher wishes to investigate. It informs the qualitative prediction of the molecules, as well as a probability quantitative value of activity. MolPredictX also provides the possibility for the researcher to download predictions in the .csv format
